input_text.Prompt:
Using the product specifications and product specification, write a copy that follows the AIDA framework (Attention, Interest, Desire, Action) for a product or service. The copy should be concise, catchy, and persuasive.

Product specification:
Black Flowers Hard Snap On Case Cover Faceplate Protector for Samsung Hercules T989 Galaxy S2 T-Mobile

Product specifications:
Protect and personalize your phone with this Snap On Shield Hard Protector Case
Protects your phone from scratches, bumps, and dings
Very stylish, sleek, and easy to install
Has precise cut-outs to allow full access to all features the phone has to offer
Manufactured to fit
Requires no tools.

Product description:
input_text.Response A:
Hey there! 👋 Do you wanna keep your phone safe and look cool? 😎 We got just the thing for you! 🎁

Introducing the Black Flowers Hard Snap On Case Cover Faceplate Protector! 📱💥 It's like a superhero cape for your phone! 🦸‍♂️

This case will keep your phone safe from scratches, bumps, and dings, so you don't have to worry about it getting hurt. 🤕 And it looks so cool, you'll want to show it off to all your friends! 👯

It's easy to install, and it fits your phone perfectly. 🎯 No tools needed, yay! 🎁

So, what are you waiting for? Get your Black Flowers Hard Snap On Case Cover Faceplate Protector now and keep your phone safe and stylish! 💪😎

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
